Title: Relates to hearing procedures for certain public employees
Summary: Relates to hearing procedures for certain public employees; provides that the recommendation of a hearing officer in relation to designated managerial and confidential employees shall be considered final and not subject to change or modification.
LawCode: Amd ยง75, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to hearing procedures for certain public employees
